title: The GREAT "WALL"
body_text:
The 2007
RIVALRY of the Year
makes its first appearance in the new year!
Battle History
WALL vs. ALL 1
(DODGEBALL 93 - 6.23.07)
Completely outnumbered, Team WALL somehow overcame the seemingly insurmountable odds taking the best of five games at DODGEBALL 93.
WALL vs. ALL 2
(DODGEBALL 97 - 7.21.07)
The tables had turned on the unwelcomed visitors, now faced with the numerical disadvantage - Team WALL victorious via shut-out!
WALL vs. ALL 3
(DODGEBALL CVII - 10.13.07)
The lucky 13th of October witnessed arguably the biggest upset in the entire 2007 calendar year when Team ALL squeaked by a mere point to capture their first win.
WALL vs. ALL 4
(DODGEBALL CX3 - 11.24.07)
The "All invasion" was unable to carry any existing momentum from the previous encounter and would go on to lose this fourth battle by a rather large margin.
Brief Participant History
The various Team WALL incarnations prove the level of commitment and desire this imposing squad possesses.
Chris Adams, Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick,
and
Tom Adams
have shown up and kicked ass at each of the four gruesome wars listed above.
Their never-say-quit opponents, the misfits if you will, Team ALL, has its share of devoted men and women as well.
Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Juan Londono,
and
Kevin Megill
have remained as the core group of leaders from this over-sized mass of fighting soldiers, each of the four bravely partaking in every attempt to tear down the mighty "wall".
WALL vs. ALL 5
(coming 2.23.08)
.. Will Team WALL be able to blitz the opposition like history has shown?
.. Is the past a frightening indication of what's in store for the unwelcomed invaders?
.. Will these "rejects" pose as a viable threat in their fifth and possibly final attempt?
Round 5 is upon us.
This is DODGEBALL CXX7.
Major Announcements Coming!
The interminable war isn't the only reason to attend this gigantic gathering. All competitors are urged to listen carefully for three earth-shattering announcements concerning the forthcoming events DODGEBALL 128, DODGEBALL 129, and the Season Finale, DODGEBALL C30!
body_html:
The 2007 RIVALRY of the Year makes its first appearance in the new year!

Battle History
WALL vs. ALL 1 (DODGEBALL 93 - 6.23.07)
Completely outnumbered, Team WALL somehow overcame the seemingly insurmountable odds taking the best of five games at DODGEBALL 93.

WALL vs. ALL 2 (DODGEBALL 97 - 7.21.07)
The tables had turned on the unwelcomed visitors, now faced with the numerical disadvantage - Team WALL victorious via shut-out!

WALL vs. ALL 3 (DODGEBALL CVII - 10.13.07)
The lucky 13th of October witnessed arguably the biggest upset in the entire 2007 calendar year when Team ALL squeaked by a mere point to capture their first win.

WALL vs. ALL 4 (DODGEBALL CX3 - 11.24.07)
The "All invasion" was unable to carry any existing momentum from the previous encounter and would go on to lose this fourth battle by a rather large margin.

Brief Participant History
The various Team WALL incarnations prove the level of commitment and desire this imposing squad possesses. Chris Adams, Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, and Tom Adams have shown up and kicked ass at each of the four gruesome wars listed above.

Their never-say-quit opponents, the misfits if you will, Team ALL, has its share of devoted men and women as well. Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Juan Londono, and Kevin Megill have remained as the core group of leaders from this over-sized mass of fighting soldiers, each of the four bravely partaking in every attempt to tear down the mighty "wall".

WALL vs. ALL 5 (coming 2.23.08)
.. Will Team WALL be able to blitz the opposition like history has shown?
.. Is the past a frightening indication of what's in store for the unwelcomed invaders?
.. Will these "rejects" pose as a viable threat in their fifth and possibly final attempt?

Round 5 is upon us.
This is DODGEBALL CXX7.

Major Announcements Coming!
The interminable war isn't the only reason to attend this gigantic gathering. All competitors are urged to listen carefully for three earth-shattering announcements concerning the forthcoming events DODGEBALL 128, DODGEBALL 129, and the Season Finale, DODGEBALL C30!
